title: "It's Good She's Gone, But...": Indian-American Lawmaker On Sheikh Hasina
content: Indian-American Congressman Ro Khanna today said former Bangladesh PM Sheikh Hasina's ouster from her country was "good" but the "violence now targeting Hindus was wrong".
summary: Indian-American Congressman Ro Khanna today said former Bangladesh PM Sheikh Hasina's ouster from her country was "good" but the "violence now targeting Hindus was wrong".

title: Teen ISIS Supporter Arrested For Planning Attack At Taylor Swift Concert
content: A 19-year-old IS sympathiser arrested in Austria was planning a suicide attack at a Taylor Swift concert in Vienna designed to kill many people, the intelligence agency said on Thursday.
summary: A 19-year-old IS sympathiser arrested in Austria was planning a suicide attack at a Taylor Swift concert in Vienna designed to kill many people, the intelligence agency said on Thursday.

title: What Are Ex Bangladesh PM Sheikh Hasina's Plans? India Says...
content: There is no update, yet, on Sheikh Hasina's future plans, the External Affairs Ministry said Thursday, days after the ousted Bangladeshi leader fled her country amid violent protests against her rule.
summary: There is no update, yet, on Sheikh Hasina's future plans, the External Affairs Ministry said Thursday, days after the ousted Bangladeshi leader fled her country amid violent protests against her rule.

title: Explained: Why Was This Paraguayan Swimmer Kicked Out Of Olympic Village
content: Paraguayan swimmer Luana Alonso has found herself at the centre of a controversy at the ongoing Paris Olympics. The 20-year-old failed to advance from the women's 100m butterfly heats on July 27.
summary: Paraguayan swimmer Luana Alonso has found herself at the centre of a controversy at the ongoing Paris Olympics. The 20-year-old failed to advance from the women's 100m butterfly heats on July 27.

title: British Crocodile Expert Jailed For Raping, Torturing And Killing Dogs
content: Britton crimes involved the torture and exploitation of 42 dogs, resulting in the deaths of 39, which he recorded inside a shipping container on his property.
summary: Britton crimes involved the torture and exploitation of 42 dogs, resulting in the deaths of 39, which he recorded inside a shipping container on his property.

title: How The Kamala Harris Surge Has Scrambled Trump's Battle Plan
content: A little over two weeks ago, Donald Trump's presidential campaign had visions of an expansive national strategy that would result in a landslide victory in November.
summary: A little over two weeks ago, Donald Trump's presidential campaign had visions of an expansive national strategy that would result in a landslide victory in November.

title: Massive Youtube Glitch Reported In Russia, Thousands Affected
content: Russian internet monitoring service Sboi.rf said that there had been thousands of glitches reported about YouTube in Russia. Users said they could only access YouTube via virtual private networks (VPNs).
summary: Russian internet monitoring service Sboi.rf said that there had been thousands of glitches reported about YouTube in Russia. Users said they could only access YouTube via virtual private networks (VPNs).

title: Muhammad Yunus Returns To Bangladesh To Lead New Interim Government
content: Nobel Peace Prize winner Muhammad Yunus returned to Bangladesh Thursday to lead a caretaker government after a student-led uprising ended the 15-year rule of Sheikh Hasina.
summary: Nobel Peace Prize winner Muhammad Yunus returned to Bangladesh Thursday to lead a caretaker government after a student-led uprising ended the 15-year rule of Sheikh Hasina.

title: "Bangladesh Got Second Independence": Muhammad Yunus Ahead Of Oath Ceremony
content: Nobel Peace Prize winner Muhammad Yunus on Thursday paid tribute to those killed in Bangladesh's deadly protests that toppled Sheikh Hasina's government, saying their sacrifices had brought the nation a "second independence".
summary: Nobel Peace Prize winner Muhammad Yunus on Thursday paid tribute to those killed in Bangladesh's deadly protests that toppled Sheikh Hasina's government, saying their sacrifices had brought the nation a "second independence".

title: North Korean Escapes To South, Crosses Maritime Border In Yellow Sea
content: Tens of thousands of North Koreans have fled to South Korea since the peninsula was divided by war in the 1950s, with most going overland to neighbouring China first, then entering a third country such as Thailand before entering South Korea.
summary: Tens of thousands of North Koreans have fled to South Korea since the peninsula was divided by war in the 1950s, with most going overland to neighbouring China first, then entering a third country such as Thailand before entering South Korea.

title: Russia Seeks To Jail US Russian Woman Over $50 Donation To Ukraine
content: Ksenia Karelina, who lives in the United States, was arrested in February while visiting family in Russia, accused of providing financial assistance to the Ukrainian army.
summary: Ksenia Karelina, who lives in the United States, was arrested in February while visiting family in Russia, accused of providing financial assistance to the Ukrainian army.

title: Austria Disrupts Taylor Swift Concert Attack Plot, Seizes Chemicals
content: A 19-year-old Austrian terrorism suspect had taken concrete steps in planning an attack on a Taylor Swift concert, with chemical substances found during a search of his residence, Austria's general director for public security said.
summary: A 19-year-old Austrian terrorism suspect had taken concrete steps in planning an attack on a Taylor Swift concert, with chemical substances found during a search of his residence, Austria's general director for public security said.

title: Largest 3D Printed Neighbourhood In The World Nears Completion In Texas
content: This summer, the robotic printer from ICON is finishing the last few of 100 3D-printed houses in Wolf Ranch, a community in Georgetown, Texas, about 30 miles from Austin.
summary: This summer, the robotic printer from ICON is finishing the last few of 100 3D-printed houses in Wolf Ranch, a community in Georgetown, Texas, about 30 miles from Austin.

title: 6.9 Magnitude Earthquake Strikes Japan. Tsunami Alert Issued
content: An earthquake with a magnitude of 7.1 hit southwestern Japan on Thursday, triggering tsunami advisories, public broadcaster NHK reported, but there were no immediate signs of major damage.
summary: An earthquake with a magnitude of 7.1 hit southwestern Japan on Thursday, triggering tsunami advisories, public broadcaster NHK reported, but there were no immediate signs of major damage.

title: Mpox To Be Declared A Public Health Emergency? WHO To Hold Key Meet
content: Amid the mpox outbreak, WHO Director-General Tedros Adhanom Ghebreyesus said he would convene the emergency committee "as soon as possible".
summary: Amid the mpox outbreak, WHO Director-General Tedros Adhanom Ghebreyesus said he would convene the emergency committee "as soon as possible".

title: Dell To Layoff Workers In Sales Team Reorganization With New AI-Focused Unit
content: Dell previously announced a major workforce reduction in early 2023, shedding 13,000 jobs in that fiscal year.
summary: Dell previously announced a major workforce reduction in early 2023, shedding 13,000 jobs in that fiscal year.

title: How $1.4M Watch Captures Albania's History: Explained
content: Albanian jeweller Pirro Ruco laboured day and night for five years to capture the essence of his country in a spectacular luxury watch.

title: Microbes Have Adapted To Microwave Ovens, Finds Study. How To Disinfect.
content: Microwave ovens harbour specialised communities of highly adapted microbes, according to a new study.
summary: Microwave ovens harbour specialised communities of highly adapted microbes, according to a new study.

title: Luana Alonso, Swimmer Kicked Out Of Olympics For "Inappropriate" Conduct
content: Luana Alonso, a 20-year-old swimmer from Paraguay, was asked to leave the Olympic Village for allegedly creating an "inappropriate" environment.

title: Where Will Sheikh Hasina Go? Bangladesh Ex-PM's Options After Dhaka Exit
content: Two days back, Sheikh Hasina resigned as Bangladesh Prime Minister, fled capital Dhaka amid violent protests demanding her ouster and landed near Delhi.
summary: Two days back, Sheikh Hasina resigned as Bangladesh Prime Minister, fled capital Dhaka amid violent protests demanding her ouster and landed near Delhi.
